products.title: Marco Peach Melba Vertical Blind

products.title: Williamsburg Frost White Vertical Blind
products.description: Utterly timeless, vertical blinds are the perfect choice for any room as they're waterproof and wipe clean, and this cool, contemporary williamsburg frost white blind is a perfect way to keep you window looking fresh throughout the seasons. products.title: Richmond (Blackout), Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: The light hue of the richmond (blackout) in cream belies the effectiveness of its blackout properties, formed from the thick, opaque material from which it is made. The louvres are easily adjusted to allow more or less light into the room, and when closed, none can filter through. Ensure that your visitors have a great night's sleep by hanging the cream in the guest bedroom. This blind will match a number of style choices, particularly modern, but try teaming it with a tranquil sage green for a relaxing and convivial vibe.

products.title: Milano, Waterfall - Vertical Blind
products.description: To create a dcor scheme with calming colour and creativity, opt for the enchanting milano in waterfall. This exquisite cloth features a restful cornflower blue shade and a fusion of silk-inspired threads for added decoration and texture. Plus, modern, adaptable louvres allow you to control the amount of light and breeze entering the room. Perfect for a relaxing restroom, the waterfall can be matched with a soft white background and complementing features in chalky blue and azure tones.

products.title: Lusso, Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: The lusso in cream has a paper-soft feel, making it a pleasing and appealing blind to touch. Its hue is a beautiful, homely cream, perfect for hanging in a modern family home. Between the discreet stitching and the texture of the fabric, a lightly checked appearance is formed, whilst the blind is all one colour. The cream would make a perfect addition to the kitchen, where its functional look and feel will suit the purpose of the room wonderfully.

products.title: Burlington, Mantis - Vertical Blind
products.description: In soft mint green, the burlington mantis is a traditionally patterned blind with the contemporary edge of the vertically hanging louvres. The gentle curves of the pattern are intricately stitched, offering a feeling of depth and texture. Opt for a cool colour palette in the kitchen to keep the room feeling light and airy by pairing the mantis with pure whites. Keep the base of the room white, using matching mint hues to accessorise, and go for silver fixtures and fittings to complement.

products.title: Talbot Pearly White Vertical Blind
products.description: For a worry-free bathroom, their pvc vertical blinds are a perfect remedy. products.title: Uniview 3200 Urban Dark Grey/white 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their uniview 3200 vertical blinds are flame-retardant, dimout screen fabrics. As a pvc / polyester fabric they're ideal for temperature control in offices and hot roomns. In addition to this, their 'magic screen' blinds ensure you can still see outside but don't let people outside see in. They're great for optimal privacy control and come in a stylish set of key neutral colours. Their urban dark grey / white is a bold, modern choice.
